Item.comments: Compiles all the Business Calendar Year items into an internal table
Item.method_code:
' This takes 5 seconds to regenerate 30 years of business ' calendars. So one could argue for making this method ' the event handler for onAfterAdd, onAfterUpdate, onAfterDelete ' the [Business Calendar] item type.
Dim tzName As String = CCO.Utilities.GetVarValue("CorporateTimeZone", "") If tzName = "" Then _ Return Me.getInnovator.newError("CorporateTimeZone Variable is not set.")
Dim callframe As Item = Me.newitem("SQL", "SQL PROCESS") callframe.setproperty("name", "business_calendar_compile") callframe.setproperty("PROCESS", "CALL") callframe.setproperty("ARG1", "1") callframe.setproperty("ARG2", tzName) Dim resultframe As Item = callframe.apply() If resultframe.isError() Then Return(resultframe)
Dim result_status As String = resultframe.getproperty("result_status") Dim result_text As String = resultframe.getproperty("result_text")
If result_status <> "SUCCESS" Then _ Return Me.getInnovator.newError("business_calendar_compile " + result_text) Return Me.getInnovator.newResult(result_text)
